about.title: Reliable Logistics Partner Across the Globe
about.description: At Maxline Global, we connect businesses to markets across the world. With our comprehensive logistics partner and commitment to service excellence, we ensure your cargo moves with speed, safety, and precision.

services.description: Maxline turns fragmented workflows into unified strategies. Whether you're in the office or across the globe, we're one connected force

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Discover quick answers to the questions our clients ask most. From shipment tracking to specialized cargo handling, our FAQ section covers everything you need to know about Maxline Global's services, capabilities, and commitment to smooth, secure, and on-time delivery.

faqList.question: What logistics services does Maxline Global offer?
faqList.answer: Maxline Global provides a full range of logistics solutions including sea, air, and land freight, customs clearance, warehousing, project cargo handling, chartering, and more â€” tailored to your business needs across the GCC and beyond.

faqList.question: Which regions or countries does Maxline Global serve?
faqList.answer: We operate globally with a strong presence across the GCC countries, Asia, Europe, Africa, and the Americas. Our network enables seamless international trade and efficient cargo movement across all major trade lanes.

faqList.question: Do you handle dangerous or hazardous cargo?
faqList.answer: Yes. Maxline Global is certified and experienced in handling hazardous and non-hazardous materials, including chemicals and reefer (temperature-controlled) cargo. Our team follows strict safety standards and international regulations.

faqList.question: Can you manage oversized or project cargo?
faqList.answer: Absolutely. We offer project logistics solutions including heavy lift transport, Ro/Ro services, aircraft/ship chartering, and military or government shipment handling. We also provide port supervision and route planning for complex cargo.

faqList.question: Do you provide warehousing and distribution services?
faqList.answer: Yes. We operate modern warehousing facilities in and around Jebel Ali Free Zone (JAFZA) with services like palletizing, shrink wrapping, labeling, and web-based inventory management. We also offer local and international distribution services.

faqList.question: How can I track my shipment?
faqList.answer: We provide an easy-to-use Track & Trace system for real-time shipment updates. Clients can log in to our portal to view current location, estimated delivery time, and shipment history.

faqList.question: Do you provide door-to-door logistics services?
faqList.answer: Yes. We offer door-to-door, door-to-port, and port-to-door services for both LCL (Less than Container Load) and FCL (Full Container Load) shipments. This includes document handling, customs clearance, and final delivery.

faqList.question: How do I get a quote for freight services?
faqList.answer: Our team is available Monday to Friday, from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM (UAE time). We are closed on weekends and public holidays. For urgent shipments, we can make special arrangements.

faqList.question: What are your business hours?
faqList.answer: Our team is available Monday to Friday, from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM (UAE time). We are closed on weekends and public holidays. For urgent shipments, we can make special arrangements.

faqList.question: Why should I choose Maxline Global as my logistics partner?
faqList.answer: Maxline Global combines deep industry experience, a global network, and advanced logistics technology to offer flexible, scalable, and cost-effective supply chain solutions. We prioritize customer satisfaction, accuracy, and on-time delivery for every shipment.

faqList.question: What types of cargo does Maxline Global handle?
faqList.answer: Maxline Global handles a wide range of cargo, including general freight, hazardous and non-hazardous goods, temperature-sensitive shipments, oversized project cargo, and time-critical deliveries by land, sea, and air.

faqList.question: Do you provide customs clearance services?
faqList.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive customs brokerage services for import, export, and transshipment across sea and air freight. Our team ensures compliance and smooth clearance through all major ports.

AboutPage.heroTitle: Building Smarter Supply Chains for a Connected World.

whatWeDo.title: What we do?
whatWeDo.description: At Maxline global logistics solutions, our mission is to provide exceptional logistics services to our clients, enabling them to streamline their supply chain and focus on their core business operations. We have been serving our clients with top-notch freight forwarding end-to-end service from its inception.

list.label: Vision
list.title: Leading with Vision, Moving with Purpose.
list.description: Our vision is to be the foremost leader in the freight forwarding industry, renowned for our innovative, sustainable, and customer-centric logistics solutions that redefine industry standards.

list.label: Mission
list.title: Driven by Purpose. Defined by Progress.
list.description: Our mission is to deliver unparalleled excellence in freight forwarding by providing innovative, sustainable, and customer-focused solutions. We strive to exceed expectations, create lasting value for our clients, and drive progress in the logistics sector.

list.label: Fast Service
list.title: Logistics at the Speed of Business.
list.description: We are committed to providing fast and reliable logistics services, ensuring the timely and efficient delivery of your goods. Our focus is on meeting and exceeding your expectations, helping your business thrive in today's fast-paced market. Experience the speed and efficiency of our logistics solutions.

list.label: 100% Accuracy
list.title: Delivering Accuracy, Every Time.
list.description: We guarantee 100% accuracy in every shipment through meticulous planning, streamlined processes, and efficient communication. Leveraging advanced technologies like real-time tracking and automation, we ensure precision and reliability, giving you peace of mind with every delivery. Trust us for accurate and dependable logistics solutions.

clients.label: Our clients
clients.title: These Companies Trust Us to Deliver Their Vision

AboutPage.words: In a world where delays and cost overruns are common, Maxline Global Logistics delivers with precision. We commit to timelines and budgetsâ€”and we deliver. This promise drives how we train our teams, apply smart logistics technology, and serve clients worldwide.

certification.title: Certified for Excellence in Global Logistics
certification.description: Maxline Global's certifications demonstrate our commitment to safe, efficient, and compliant logistics across air, sea, and land. We meet international standards in freight forwarding, warehousing, customs, and hazardous cargo-ensuring trust and reliability throughout the supply chain.

ServicesPage.title: Logistics Services | Maxline Global
ServicesPage.description: Explore our full suite of global logistics servicesâ€”from air, sea, and road freight to warehousing, customs clearance, and project cargo management. Maxline Global delivers reliable, scalable, and end-to-end solutions for every supply chain challenge.
ServicesPage.keywords: logistics services, global logistics, air freight, sea freight, road freight, warehousing, customs clearance, project cargo, supply chain solutions

ContactPage.subtitle: Contact us

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.text1: This Privacy Policy describes how Maxline Global, a premier freight forwarding and logistics provider, collects, uses, processes, and discloses your information when you use our website and services. We specialize in providing integrated freight solutions across air, sea, and land transportation, warehousing, and project forwarding services.
introduction.text2: By using our website and submitting information through our forms, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with our policies and practices, please do not use our website or submit information through our forms.

informationYouProvide.title: Information You Provide
informationYouProvide.text: When you use our contact and quote request forms, we collect:

serviceInformation.title: Service Information:
serviceInformation.serviceType: Service type preferences (FTL, LTL, Project Cargo)

automaticallyCollected.title: Automatically Collected Information
automaticallyCollected.text: When you visit our website, we automatically collect:
automaticallyCollected.deviceInfo: Device information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
automaticallyCollected.usageData: Usage data (pages visited, time spent, links clicked)
automaticallyCollected.locationInfo: Location information (if permitted by your device settings)

howWeUseYourInformation.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUseYourInformation.text: We use the information we collect to:
howWeUseYourInformation.processRequests: Process and respond to your quote requests and inquiries
howWeUseYourInformation.provideSolutions: Provide personalized logistics solutions across air, sea, and land transportation
howWeUseYourInformation.handleProjectForwarding: Handle project forwarding and specialized cargo
howWeUseYourInformation.communicateShipments: Communicate with you about your shipments and services
howWeUseYourInformation.sendNotices: Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
howWeUseYourInformation.improveServices: Improve our services and customer experience
howWeUseYourInformation.complyLegal: Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
howWeUseYourInformation.protectFraud: Protect against fraud and unauthorized transactions

informationSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
informationSharing.text: We may share your information with:
informationSharing.logisticsPartners: Our logistics partners and service providers
informationSharing.lawEnforcement: Law enforcement when required by law

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information, including:
dataSecurity.encryption: Encryption of data in transit and at rest
dataSecurity.secureSubmission: Secure form submission and data processing
dataSecurity.disclaimer: While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
yourRights.text: You have certain rights regarding your personal information:
yourRights.object: Object to processing of your information
yourRights.contact: To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

internationalTransfers.title: International Data Transfers
internationalTransfers.text: As a global logistics provider operating across multiple countries including the UAE, Saudi Arabia, Oman, Kuwait, Bahrain, Qatar, and the United Kingdom, your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. These countries may have different data protection laws. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your information when transferred internationally.

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.text: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new privacy policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.text: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at:

hero.subtitle: Get a Quote

allInOne.description: Integrated land, air, and sea freight services with warehousing and customs support.

fastResponse.title: Fast Response Times
fastResponse.description: Get detailed quotes within 24 hours, based on your exact shipment requirements.

expertGuidance.title: Expert Guidance

main.title: Request Your Logistics Quote

hero.subtitle: Join Our Team
hero.description: Join a team that's powering the future of technology and logistics.

mission.title: Building Careers, Not Just Jobs
mission.description1: At Maxline Global, we don't just offer jobsâ€”we build careers. As a leading provider of cutting-edge technology solutions, logistics innovations, and global distribution, we're on a mission to simplify and transform industries through smart, scalable solutions.
mission.description2: We believe that our success is driven by the talent, passion, and innovation of our people. If you're looking for a place where your ideas are valued, your growth is supported, and your work truly mattersâ€”you're in the right place.

list.title: Innovative Environment
list.description: Work on forward-thinking projects in tech, logistics, and global distribution.

list.title: Career Growth
list.description: Get the support and tools to advance your skills and grow within the company.

list.title: Inclusive Culture
list.description: Join a diverse, collaborative team that values transparency and integrity.

list.title: Global Impact
list.description: Be part of a company making waves across international markets.

list.title: Work-Life Balance

cta.title: Ready to Power the Future?
cta.description: Whether you're an experienced professional or just starting out, Maxline Global is a place to grow, innovate, and lead. Join us in shaping the future.
